Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto (Problemas para usar el PIN)
Reviews.Author: Jose U
Reviews.Content: Muy buen producto, venía con todos sus accesorios, bien empacado. El teclado y el diccionario son excelentes (Pearl 9105), se escribe sabroso en este teléfono. El software es bastante bueno, no se guinda. La resolución de la pantalla es muy buena, tiene bastante nitidez. Y el aparato es bien rápido en comparación con otros BB.Lo compré para Movilnet Venezuela. Le coloqué el chip y lo básico funcionó bien. Si agarra 3G de Movilnet.Lo que si, es que tuve algunos problemas para poder utilizar el Pin y el correo. Pero al final todo se solucionó.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING CELL PHONE !!! EXCELENTE CELULAR
Reviews.Author: Cristina Gutiérrez
Reviews.Content: The cell phone arrived on time , everything is good, I also checked with a south american sim card and it work good !! I AM SUPER HAPPY WITH THIS ITEM, I RECOMEND THIS SELLER .

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Joe Benitez
Reviews.Content: This is just the right phone if you are looking for chat, facebook, whatsapp, WiFi and GPS function in one little handset. Elegant and easy to use. It works OK in Ecuador (HSDPA 850 / GSM 850) so don't hesitate to buy this phone if you are wondering if it will work in Ecuador!

Reviews.Title: Very dissatisfied, the phone does not work
Reviews.Author: rafa_vzla
Reviews.Content: I write from Venezuela.The seller "Cam X Live" is irresponsible and not recommended for any purchase, the phone arrived defective I do not know if it is used or refurbished, and the publication says that the phone is new, I have sent 3 emails to the seller and a request to return the phone and did not respond to anything.I can not use the telephone PIN, does not connect to server blackberry and the seller just does not respond, and Amazon does nothing.Buyer very dissatisfied, I gave them $ 190 and nobody does anything.

Reviews.Title: Compacto y Delicado
Reviews.Author: laurhect
Reviews.Content: Excelente el tiempo de envío, diseño del móvil, ligero, compacto, delicado, practico, liberado.Lamentablemente este equipo nevega en 3G para tecnologia CDMA y en 2G para tecnologia GSM, aclaratoria que no vi en la publicación!!! y viene solo con el idioma Ingles y Frances

Reviews.Title: malisimo
Reviews.Author: MARIELA
Reviews.Content: llego con la pantalla desprendida, el receptor de carga duro tres dias , en movistar venezuela NO levanto 3G, es decir pesimo, mi hija estaba casi que llora por haberse embarcado con este telefono

Reviews.Title: Toda una estafa
Reviews.Author: César Ortega
Reviews.Content: El tlf llego bien. Una vez se me cayo, lo lleve a servicio técnico donde un amigo mio y cual fue la sorpresa: el teléfono era refabricado o reparado. Les digo a amazon y al vendedor, es importante mantener seriedad en este tipo de negocios.

Reviews.Title: I lost my money
Reviews.Author: Jose Guerrero
Reviews.Content: First the phone is not unlocked.4 months after the screen does not turn on again.The technician who examined him said the phone was refurbished.the repair was more costly than the value he paid for the phone and gave no guaranteeI just lost my money

Reviews.Title: A FRAUD
Reviews.Author: Olumide
Reviews.Content: This product is refurbished.The battery does not work, and the phone does not charge.It is a fraudulent sale, and Amazon should remove the product seller from its site.I am very disappointed to have bought this product on the Amazon website.

Reviews.Title: De el Estado Miranda Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Anyoli
Reviews.Content: Excelente vendedor, el equipo llego en buenas condiciones y en el tiempo estimado. Lo recomiendo 100%. Lo unico es que el equipo vino con el idioma de visulizacion en ingles pero con el desktop, Blackberry Manager se le descarga el idioma de su preferencia.este telefono es lo maximo

Reviews.Title: The shipping box or envelope isn't damaged but the item is damaged
Reviews.Author: Jesus Cordoba
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving the product in Venezuela I noticed that the phone screen was broken and the trackpad button is defective, so request are returned the funds used for the purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: esto es una estafa con la compra del telefono
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDER ChAVEZ
Reviews.Content: good morning sir I am writing because the phone they buy new wine and the card you rebuild this buentiada this is a scam because I buy new. need to send me a new one or give me the money if I will not take actions Store comtra expect an answer thanks

Reviews.Title: PATETICO
Reviews.Author: Mile
Reviews.Content: EL TELEFONO TENIA LA PANTALLA DAÑADA NI SIQUIERA LO PUDE UTILIZAR NI REPARAR... QUE PORQUERIA. NO COMPREN CELULARES POR ESTE MEDIO LAMENTABLEMENTE TUVE UNA MUY MALA EXPERIENCIA.

Reviews.Title: Yo compré un telefono NUEVO ORIGINAL, "NO NUEVO RECONSTRUIDO"
Reviews.Author: Juan Alejandro Rodriguez Baez
Reviews.Content: OJO, pensé que se trataban de vendedores serios y no unos vendedores deshonestos al despacharme un producto RECONSTRUIDO (REFURBISHED) ahora si el precio hubiece sido más bajo y el producto indicara ser  reconstruido NO me hubiece quejado, Vendedor NO recomendado

Reviews.Title: problem with cell phone
Reviews.Author: jimmy noirega
Reviews.Content: hello, I have problems with cell phone service I can not use the Internet indicates not connected as I can help the possibility of returning the product?

Reviews.Title: your need to specify more bb 9105
Reviews.Author: JOSE IZQUIEL/R. J. DIAZ "telef corporativo, malo"
Reviews.Content: I arrive at the expected time, does not work in Venezuela operators. the pin does not work and there is no reason why?.because bring BES more not BIS, i can't use my account personal. I dont have bussiness

Reviews.Title: Vino dañado y super usado
Reviews.Author: Yuselin
Reviews.Content: Pedí un Tlf nuevo y me enviaron uno usado y dañado de paso se tardo mucho tiempo en llegar. no lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Purchase problems
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: When I see this product I was confident of the seller information about it. But when my blackberry arrived at home, i had to face a lot of problems with it. First, I realized that they didn't send me the new equipment that i bougth, instead of that i received an used one. Second, it wasn't well joint, that was the main reason for having broken pieces. Third, the blackberry included a memory card but it didn't arrive neither.

Reviews.Title: more or less
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: i think that the phone had some use because it had a broken piece so it didnt came in perfect conditions

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9105 International version
Reviews.Author: VE95821, CARLOS FIGUERA
Reviews.Content: Feliz dia. De verdad compre el teléfono Blackberry9105 porque me llamaba mucho la atención, ya había escuchado opiniones de personas diciendo que este era muy bueno.Compre el celular un sábado. El día lunes la tienda ya había procesado el envió gratis.  El día miércoles ya estaba en Miami listo para enviarlo a Venezuela, con la empresa que contrate para que me lo importaran. Para el día viernes ya estaba en la oficina de la aduana de Maiquetía. El martes siguiente me lo entregaron.De verdad por ahí no tengo ninguna queja.  Cuando abrí la caja encontré todo en orden con la excepción de que el celular tiene hundido el Trackpad óptico y esto no se ve bien. Aunque funciona perfectamente. Y la carcasa del celular pareciera que no encaja muy bien entre si.El funcionamiento como tal es de maravilla se conecta con rapidez y se mantiene conectado con las tres operadoras, Movilnet, Movistar y Digitel. El único problema es el Trackpad óptico y la cubierta delantera y trasera que esta descuadrada.FUE COMPRADO A BLUE ELECTRONICHappy day. I really buy the phone because I called Blackberry9105 much attention, and heard opinions from people saying that this was very good.Buy the phone on a Saturday. On Monday, the store had processed the free shipping. On Wednesday he was ready to send Miami to Venezuela, the company that hired it for me mattered. By Friday he was at the customs office of Maiquetía. The following Tuesday I delivered him.In truth I have no complaints there. When I opened the box I found everything in order with the exception that the phone has sunk Optical trackpad and it does not look good. Although it works perfectly. And the cell housing does not seem to fit very well with each other.The operation itself is a wonderful connect quickly and stay connected to the three operators, Movilnet, Movistar and Digitel. The only problem is that optical trackpad and the front and rear is out of position.WAS PURCHASED FROM BLUE-ELECTRONIC

Reviews.Title: Compra de Telefono 9105 Blackberry
Reviews.Author: Francisco Flores
Reviews.Content: Buenos dias recomiendo ampliamente este articulo, hasta ahora todo a funcionado perfectamente, es practico, pequeño y muy util.  Cumple absolutamente con todas las expectativas que tenia sobre el equipo celular.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: Good it is a rapid equipment of excellent quality the design works perfectly I like very good quality of images and good rendimento

Reviews.Title: Very Fast and reliable
Reviews.Author: Mckoy
Reviews.Content: Got my 9105 and It's PERFECT!!! This is my 2nd pearl 9105 and I still loved it! What more can I say? Thank you

Reviews.Title: Best regards
Reviews.Author: Wilfredo Urbina
Reviews.Content: good everything went well but the phone came with some details I guess the trip on the appliance but is working

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: David Peña
Reviews.Content: MUY BUEN PRODUCTO LO RECOMIENDO 100%  EXCELENTE, CALIDAD, RAPIDA ENTREGA, FUE EL PRODUCTO QUE SE COMPRO, NO FALTO NADA OK

Reviews.Title: inconforme con el producto
Reviews.Author: graciela paez
Reviews.Content: hello, purchased in December 2012 a blackberry 9105 pearl gsm phone and reach Venezuela in January 2013 the phone did not work and I had many pin shipping plus customs tax in Venezuela, this has been a fraud.RIM BlackBerry 9105 Pearl 3G Unlocked GSM Smartphone - 3MP Camera, WiFi, GPS -- International Version(Black)

Reviews.Title: a
Reviews.Author: Angelys
Reviews.Content: Que decepcion! el producto me vino defectuoso! el sensor vino dañado y para completar cuando entran las llamadas no puedo escuchar. Por lo tanto lo que puedo pensar es que el producto no era nuevo aunque todo vino sellado...

Reviews.Title: calidad de telefono.
Reviews.Author: Orangel
Reviews.Content: Tuvo un ligero retrazo la llegada a mis manos. hoy lo comencé a usar. Espero me resulte como se muestra.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Nunes
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, llego en excelentes condiciones, lo recomiendo al 100%. Vendedor Excelente y serio. Saludos y que dios los bendiga

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Leidyangel
Reviews.Content: Todo muy bien. Me gusto... Fue lo que pedi... llego a tiempo... Excelente, recomendando 100%...Saludos desde Valencia - Venezuela...

Reviews.Title: Producto defectuoso
Reviews.Author: Carla Aguirre
Reviews.Content: Realice la compra de un teléfono Nuevo, y me llegó un teléfono usado, ademas la caracasa está dañada, la tapa de atrás no es la que le corresponde al teléfono por lo tanto no cierra correctamente, no trajo la tarjeta de memoria, y sé que el teléfono está usado porque tiene contactos de pin y hasta conversaciones guardadas en el teléfono. Que falta de seriedad, ahora bien, como se va a solventar esto. Porque pague $298 por un teléfono NUEVO!!!!  no este aparato usado que ni bien ensamblado está.Necesito una pronta respuesta para saber como se solucionará!

Reviews.Title: Problema con la memoria
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: El teléfono se tardo un poco en llegar pero me presento un problema con el slot de la memoria la detecta cuando quiere pero de resto el telefono esta en perfectas condicionesThe phone takes a while to arrive but I have a problem with the memory slot is detected when it wants to rest but the phone is in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: MUY BUENO
Reviews.Author: Jorge Moran
Reviews.Content: EL CELULAR BLACKBERRY PEARL 9105, QUE SOLICITE LLEGO EN BUENAS CONDICIONES ESTOY SATISFECHO CON LA COMPRA, TARDO UN POCO PERO LO IMPORTANTE ES QUE FUNCIONE CON LA OPERADORAS DE ECUADOR..FELICITACIONES Y SIGAN ASI PARA BENEFICIO DE LOS COMPRADORES. AL MOMENTO ESTOY REALIZANDO OTRAS COMPRAS..

Reviews.Title: Great phone; has one major drawback
Reviews.Author: Travis S.
Reviews.Content: We have been very happy with the both the price point and functionality of the BlackBerry Pearl (9105). The phone does everything that we need, like BlackBerry messaging, texting, phone calls, and surfing the net.Pros:1) Small and compact as compared to other Blackberry products.2) Battery lasts a good two days on standby, and a full day with moderate use (with 2+ hours of talktime)3) Screen is small, but brightCons:1) Trackpad (or whatever it is termed) can be very difficult to use, even after adjusting the sensitivity inputs. If you are constantly scrolling through applications, the whole exercise can become very frustrating. From other reviews the regular "ball style" roller of other BlackBerry's seems to work a whole lot better.2) No Skype application yet. Unlike other BlackBerry devices I have not found a native Skype application for this phone.3) SureType, the built in autofill logic, has been difficult for us to learn. You do have the option to turn this off though.4) Handset ear speaker can be a bit low at times; sometimes its difficult to hear the conversation.Overall if your looking for a BlackBerry for work applications, I would not recommend this phone. If your looking for a compact phone with most BlackBerry functionality, I would recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Defect in the trackpad
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Aponte Reyes "Lar"
Reviews.Content: A phone with a small defect in the tracpad is not level, it is tilted to one side. No problem with the sim card of my operator. It really is an unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: muy buena atencion y muy bueno su servicio estoy contenta por sus servicios prestados
Reviews.Author: fanny bravo
Reviews.Content: yo lo califico con cinco estrellas el servicio y atencion fue muy bueno y el equipo es maravilloso y estoy contenta con la compra.graciasfanny bravo

Reviews.Title: EXELENTE TELEFONO Y EXELENTE SERVCIO
Reviews.Author: OSCAR GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: MUY BUEN TELEFONO,  VIENE CON TODOS SUS ACCESORIOS Y EN PERFECTO ESTADO.ME LLEGO A VENEZUELA EN SOLO 16 DIAS LOS FELICITO.RECOMENDADO 100 %. GRACIAS....UNA OBSERVACION EL PRODUCTO NO AGARRA 3G PARA DIGITEL AQUI EN VENEZUELA, YA QUE EL SOFWARE ESTA DISPONIBLE SOLO PARA MOVISTAR Y MOVILNET MIENTRAS SI SE COMPRA EL PRODUCTO AQUI EN EL PAIS SI AGARRA 3G DIGITEL.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mariah
Reviews.Content: This phone is perfect. It is small and has all the functions of a smartphone with a traditional keyboard. It works perfectly, fast wifi connection and easy to use. It also has included support. Simply wonderful. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOD
Reviews.Author: Jampasu
Reviews.Content: Excellent mobile equipment. I dare say that is one of the best BlackBerry we have ... We recommend ...BlackBerry PRD-30903-011 RIM 9105 Pearl 3G Unlocked GSM Smartphone with 3MP Camera, WiFi, GPS - No Warranty - Black

Reviews.Title: Excellent BB for a very low price!
Reviews.Author: FIRCAS "fircas"
Reviews.Content: Is a great phone for the price. Excellent design with just the right size! The keyboard layout is great for a person whos coming from a 14 keys phone or a person that is just entering to the Rim world! The SureType technology is very intuitive and precise.. and every new word is saved right away! The processor is really fast and responsive, making every task without problems even if you are running several apps! The display is really bright and sharp. The Camera is just great, with a powerfull led and the video quality is also very neat for this type of phones.Is an excellent choice for your first Blackberry even if you dont know this brand at all. You will be happy!

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Slim, lightweight BlackBerry with SureType QWERTY keyboard for accessing e-mail, messaging, Web browsing data downloads
Wi-Fi networking; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 32 GB; 3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder
Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 432 hours (18 days) of standby time; released in October, 2010
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Slim, lightweight BlackBerry with SureType QWERTY keyboard for accessing all your e-mail and messaging plus fast Web browsing and data downloads
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
